alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Chester (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Castle, southeastern Chester and southwestern Delaware Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kennett Square, or near West Chester, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Elsmere, Kennett Square, Newport, Greenville, Stanton, Talleyville, Wilmington Manor, Pike Creek, Hockessin, Ashland, North Star, Bellefonte, Edgemoor and Claymont. This includes Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 7 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
